#summary mintcream is a color keyword defined in CSS and usable wherever a color value is required.
#labels about-css

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [CSSReference CSS Reference] > [CSSColors Colors] > *mintcream*

== Value ==

The `mintcream` color keyword is equivalent to `#f5fffa`.
